summary: Replaced mock metadata and content with official funteru.co.jp information, reframed as Ryo Tsurutani's personal portfolio (site metadata, hero copy, profile, projects, timeline for ShiftScanner, RemoVision, CodeClipper, MHLab, corporate site, and contract work).

testing.notes: Manual check needed in dev preview to confirm new copy renders and outbound links (App Store/site/email) open correctly.

hardcode.notes: All URLs/emails/copy centralized in config/data modules; no secrets or environment-dependent literals added to components.
